channel.title: british on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in british on Recipes

item.title: Bangers_and_mash
item.description: Ingredients 2 potatoes, cubed 5 - 6 banger sausages 1 red onion, cut into slices (You can use the onion of your choice) 1 tbsp of butter 1 tbsp of olive oil 3 cloves of garlic, chopped 2 tbsp of milk 1 tsp of garlic powder 1/2 tsp of salt 1 tsp of pepper 1 tbsp of Worcestershire sauce 1 1/2 cups of beef broth (I use a Knorr mix with water/beef cubes can also be used)

item.title: Cornish_pasties
item.description: Ingredients Pastry: 450 g (3 2/3 cups) plain (all purpose) flour. plus a couple of tbsp extra for rolling out the pastry and sprinkling on the tray later 2 tsp baking powder 1 tsp salt 125 g (1/2 cup + 1 tsp) unsalted butter chopped 2 egg yolks 125 ml (1/2 cup) cold water Pasty Filling: 450 g (1 lb) potato peeled and finely diced 150 g (1/3 lb) swede/rutagaba peeled and finely diced

item.title: Fish_and_chips
item.description: Ingredients The Chips: 4 Russet Potatoes 2 quarts (1.9L) of vegetable oil 2 tablespoons (36g) kosher salt 1.5 teaspoons (under 1g) fresh ground black pepper 1 teaspoon (3g) garlic powder The Fish: 2 lbs (907g) Cod, 2 - 3‚Äù pieces 1 teaspoon (5g) kosher salt 1 cup (150g) AP flour, plus more in a separate bowl for dredging 1 teaspoon (under 1g) baking powder 1 teaspoon (3g) garlic powder
